de.uzk.hki.da.service

Class RegisterObjectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uzk.hki.da.service.RegisterObjectService

  • public class RegisterObjectService
extends Object
    Registers objects at a certain node. Checks if package is a delta. Generates an object identifier and creates new object entry in case it is not a delta.
    Author:
    Daniel M. de Oliveira, Thomas Kleinke

      • generateURNForNode

        public String generateURNForNode(Node node,
                        Date date)
        To ensure we never generate a URN twice this method is synchronized. Since we know that every node has a special character in the urn which decodes the node (-1-,-2-,...) we can guarantee the newly generated URN is unique.
        Parameters:
        node - the node
        date - the date
        Returns:
        the string
